type: Search and Rescue Sleeping Bag System
short_summary: Sleep Bag SBS for Search and Rescue Technicians
description: This RFI is to procure a Sleeping Bag System (SBS) for Search and Rescue Technicians. The RFQ will be for stock replenishment of the new system. It is for the procurement of commercial off the shelf or military off the shelf products available for purchase.
duration_in_months: These bid are required for a period of 12 months
